title: CJCALLS
author: CJCALLS
content: Introducing Crackerjacker (cjcalls.com)Experience Excellence! Crypto reviews built on excellence!Crackerjacker is at the forefront of investor confidence by providing unique marketing solutions. We help projects gain reputation by looking into various factors of a token. We are a group of marketers, developers and investors with a common goal to help shape the way crypto marketing is delivered.  ✅ TELEGRAM - Join here! ✅ Join our community and never miss an opportunity to invest in safe and secure projects.  ✅ EMAIL CALLS - Sign up!  ✅ Join our email list to receive unique email calls straight to your inbox! ✅ REFER & EARN - Refer here!  ✅ Refer projects to us and earn $100 for every successful review!Why us!Shouting out the latest BNB, ETH and DeFi projects with a focus on ensuring our investors remain safe and informed!Analytical research   We look into over 16 categories when ranking tokens including:, Private sale, Presale, Private sale, Launch, KYC, Audit, NFT, Marketing, Brand, Objectives, Security, Utility, Cashflow, Roadmap, Company, Strategy, Retention. We focus on the Why's so for example why did x token launch with the specific marketcap, what was the reason behind this, what do you plan or did you achieve with the funds in a way which brings investors a higher rate of return and investment?Our confidence scores  We don’t just list any project or token, if we feel something isn’t right we will say so. All projects and tokens will undergo a vetting process based on 16 categories. The overall score is our confidence score and will be awarded upon each Telegram call.Competitive  We aim to bridge the gap between crypto marketing and digital marketing services by becoming the most competitively priced marketing provider in the defi space.Benefits for investors and projects!  Benefits for investors  - Read more here! Legitimate reviewsNo insider tradingBuilt with confidenceRefer & earnConfidence by rankCompetitions & giveaways  Benefits for tokens  - Read more here!
